channel.title: BUscience

item.title: Sharp depletion in soil moisture drives land water to flow into oceans, contributing to sea level rise

item.title: Dexterity and climbing ability: how ancient human relatives used their hands

item.title: Handy octopus robot can adapt to its surroundings
item.description: Scientists inspired by the octopus's nervous system have developed a robot that can decide how to move or grip objects by sensing its environment.
